content: **willow hat** ======================================= **pattern includes a full video tutorial ** the willow hat is a stylish crochet hat pattern with a fabulous texture worked from the bottom up and using a #4/worsted weight yarn this hat is such a quick make the gorgeous purl look stitch pattern is achieved with loosely worked slip stitches don t be afraid of them with a little practice there is no turning back this pattern is written for 6 sizes baby toddler child tween adult small and adult large to fit head circumference baby 14 -16 / 35 5cm - 40 5cm toddler 16 -18 / 40 5cm - 45 5cm child 18 -20 / 45 5cm - 51cm tween 20 -21 / 51cm - 53 5cm adult small 22 -23 / 56cm - 58 5cm adult large 23 -24 / 58 5cm - 61cm **materials** yarn wecrochet wool of the andes tweed 1 in down heather baby 60 yds / 55m toddler 80 yds / 73m child 100 yds / 91m tween 120 yds / 110m adult small 140 yds / 128m adult large 170 yds / 155m hook 5 5mm i-9 crochet hook 2 or hook required to meet gauge --- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 3 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more ---- © ned & mimi 2022 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *due to the nature of the pdf files sales i cannot refund any patterns as it is not possible to return the purchase however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns * *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted * 1 https //shrsl com/3oluh 2 https //shrsl com/3p74i 3 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe
